description:
With the World Duel Carnival about to begin, Yuma gets set to take on the best duelists from around the world… that is, until he realizes he never entered!  Can Yuma figure out a way to join the Carnival, or will Yuma’s efforts fall short, forcing him to watch from the sidelines?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 開幕! WDC(ワールド・デュエル・カーニバル)
